basket.logInToView: Log in to view your shopping cart and make purchases!
basket.addProductsToBag: Add products to your shopping cart to make purchases.
home.subtitle.theTSG: The «TyumenStroyGaz» company is engaged in the supply of equipment for heating, water supply and sewerage systems in Tyumen and the Tyumen region.
home.subtitle.wideRange: A wide range of products. The site presents such brands as BAXI, Vaillant, Protherm, Bosch, Viessmann, RusNit, Viadrus, Drazice, Gorenje.
home.subtitle.allOurProducts: All our products meet the quality certificates and are made using the best modern materials and technologies.
home.description.advantage1: Materials are 20% cheaper. We work with suppliers directly and save your budget
home.description.advantage2: Warranty of 1 year, contract, payment by card and fiscal receipt. It's official
home.description.advantage3: We will arrive within 24 hours after the request or refund the money
home.description.advantage4: We will select materials for your needs, take delivery on ourselves, provide a full video and photo report, and also advise you years after the request
footer.companyDescriprion: TyumenStroyGaz - sale of thermal equipment in Tyumen
account.header.youCanUpdate: You can update your account at any time and make any changes to the data below.
error.passwordLength: The password must contain between 8 and 40 characters
error.onlyLetters: The name must consist only of letters
